title: Nutri Ninja Master Prep Blender Smoothie Book
description:
Nutri Ninja Master Prep Blender Smoothie Book: 101 Superfood Smoothie Recipes For Better Health, Energy and Weight Loss! by Lisa Brian

2015 | ISBN: 1511676981 | English | 174 pages | EPUB

Get a quick start with your Ninja blender and meet your goals for better health! This book is the first in a series for the Nutri Ninja Pro, Ninja Master Prep, and Ninja Kitchen System Blenders. The book features 101 Superfood Smoothies designed for various health conditions and lifestyles.
